name: Round Box Medium
description: This circular box is a classic piece for everyday usage. Handmade with a shagreen surface and wood veneer interior. It is perfect for adding a touch of luxury and practicality to any space. Wipe clean with a soft dry cloth. Made in Philippines. Please note all shagreen-covered items should be kept out of direct sunlight. Variants in color may occur, demonstrating the authentic luxurious use of natural components.
